name: Impossible Dash
description:
*AVAILABLE ONLY ON WINDOWS 7, 8 AND 10!*

Impossible Dash is an offline never-ending platformer.  I tried to make Geometry Dash but it turns out to be a total rip-off.

The controls are basically a normal click.

You can double jump 4 times.

Don't hit to a wall or spikes or you'll die.

Highscore of the developer: 218 points

Have fun ;)
